body.p: This subpart prescribes policies and procedures requiring contractors to utilize the Department of Homeland Security (DHS), United States Citizenship and Immigration Serviceâ€™s employment eligibility verification program (E-Verify) as the means for verifying employment eligibility of certain employees.
